com.sessionm.api
Interface SessionListener

public interface SessionListener

Implement this interface to receive notifications about session state changes

Field Summary
static int NETWORK_ERROR
          Constant indicating there was a network error during initialization.
 
Method Summary
 void onSessionFailed(SessionM instance, int error)
          the listener method that gets called when the session fails to initialize
 void onSessionStarted(SessionM instance)
          the listener method that gets called when the session successfully starts
 void onUserChangedSubscriptionStatus(SessionM instance, SessionM.USER_SUBSCRIPTION_STATUS optOutStatus)
          the listener method that is invoked when calling SessionM.getInstance().setUserSubscriptionStatus() method.

onUserChangedSubscriptionStatus

void onUserChangedSubscriptionStatus(SessionM instance,
                                     SessionM.USER_SUBSCRIPTION_STATUS optOutStatus)

the listener method that is invoked when calling SessionM.getInstance().setUserSubscriptionStatus() method.

Parameters:
optOutStatus - this will be USER_SUBSCRIPTION_STATUS. if the user has opted out of the m-points program
